name: horn-leech
caption: Horn Leech

effect.short: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  [Drains]{mechanic:drain} half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavorText:
The user drains the target’s energy with its horns.
The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.
